mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO PIWEB_ONLINEDATA ( ID, MEASURE_TIME, MODEL, FACTORY, UNIT_NAME, MEASURE_POINT, MEASURE_CATEGORY, CATEGORY_DIRECT, MEASURE_X, MEASURE_Y, MEASURE_Z, MEASURE_P, JUST_NO, UPDATE_TIME, RESERVE1, RESERVE2, RESERVE3 )
( select #{item.id, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.measureTime, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.model, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.factory, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.unitName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.measurePoint, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.measureCategory, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.categoryDirect, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.measureX, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.measureY, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.measureZ, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.measureP, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.justNo, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.updateTime, jdbcType=DATE}, #{item.reserve1, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.reserve2, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.reserve3, jdbcType=VARCHAR} from dual )
